name: RetroWorld: Relive your gaming childhood as a retro sprite.
blurb: Collect, sell or trade video games throughout four console generations in an open world retro landscape where video games come to life.

rewards.reward: A BIG THANK YOU\r\n==============================\r\nYou'll be immortalized on our web site on the WALL OF THANKS for making Retro World possible.
A SUPER BIG THANK YOU\r\n==============================\r\nYour name will be carved in pixels in the closing credits of the actual game, making you forever a part of this digital medium.
THE GAME\r\n==============================\r\nGet a digital copy of the game DRM free plus a Steam Key (Green Light permitting). This includes A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits.

THE GAME +The Making of Digital PDF book\r\n==============================\r\nGet a completely transparent look  into the making of the game featuring development stories, artwork and prototype concepts. This includes a digital copy of the game DRM free with Steam Key (Green Light permitting) and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits.

TWO GAME VALUE DEAL\r\n==============================\r\nGet two digital DRM free copies of the Game as well as two Steam keys (Green Light permitting). This includes THE MAKING OF RETRO WORLD Digital PDF book and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits.

THE DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK\r\n==============================\r\nYou'll receive the digital soundtrack of the game featuring the sweet melodic tunes of Retro World. This includes two digital copies of the game and two Steam keys (Green Light permitting), THE MAKING OF RETRO WORLD Digital PDF book and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits.

YOUR NAME AS PART OF THE FICTION\r\n==============================\r\nYour name will appear in one of the many in-game magazines. You'll forever have a small part in the narrative of the game as someone who wrote to a publication. You might be submitting a cheat code or simply venting about the current state of the industry. This also includes two digital copies of The Game DRM free as well as two Steam keys (Green Light permitting), the digital soundtrack of the game featuring the sweet melodic tunes of Retro World, THE MAKING OF RETRO WORLD Digital PDF book and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits.

YOUR NAME ON A BUILDING/STRUCTURE\r\n==============================\r\nWe'll commemorate a building/structure in your honor in big letters for everyone to see. We'll also include a commemorative plaque on the building with a short blurb describing why you are so awesome. This includes two digital copies of the game and two Steam keys (Green Light permitting), the digital soundtrack of the game featuring the sweet melodic tunes of Retro World, THE MAKING OF RETRO WORLD digital PDF book and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits. This does not include YOUR NAME AS PART OF THE FICTION reward.

BE A STAR/CELEBRITY IN RETRO WORLD\r\n==============================\r\nWe'll take your pixelated likeness and plaster it on huge billboards as a sports, music or movie star with your name in lights. You'll be endorsing actual products that are sold and used in Retro World. This includes two digital copies of the game and two Steam keys (Green Light permitting), the digital soundtrack of the game featuring the sweet melodic tunes of Retro World, THE MAKING OF RETRO WORLD Digital PDF book and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits. This does not include YOUR NAME AS PART OF THE FICTION reward or YOUR NAME ON A BUILDING/STRUCTURE.

LIVE IN RETRO WORLD\r\n==============================\r\nBecome an interactive NPC (Non Playable Character) in the actual game. We'll make a fully animated character in your likeness that lives and breathes in Retro World. You'll even get a speaking part in the form of a small dialog tree with a topic of your choosing. (topic is subject to approval. We can't have you say mean things or promote products that do not exist in the Retro World universe. We're thinking more like a hobby or some words of wisdom.) This includes two digital copies of the game and two Steam keys (Green Light permitting), the digital soundtrack of the game featuring the sweet melodic tunes of Retro World, THE MAKING OF RETRO WORLD Digital PDF book and A SUPER BIG THANK YOU in the game credits. This does not include YOUR NAME AS PART OF THE FICTION reward or YOUR NAME ON A BUILDING/STRUCTURE.
